posts.message:
Hi Geeks :)
did you face that issue during your work before.
I am working on hybrid solution MVC 5 + Webform, for some reasons one of foreign team wants to use AjaxToolKit and when we upgraded our solution to framework 4.5.1 it fails so i did upgrade to latest version of AjaxToolkit and it returns to work fine again but now for some reasons which we couldn't understand it stopped loading!! and threw msg "Uncaught Error: ASP.NET Ajax client-side framework failed to load."
I did a lot of investigations about that issue and even did upgrades for different versions of AjaxToolKit but still the same message appeared.
Any help :(

Brilliant work from google .. o.O !

Google Tone helps computers communicate like we do—by talking to each other. It's a browser extension that lets Chrome use your computer's speakers to produce a special sound signature for other computers' microphones to identify as a URL.
posts.caption: chrome.google.com
posts.description: Broadcast any URL to computers within earshot.

posts.caption: yehudakatz.com
posts.description: TL;DR Although apps and gems look like they share the concept of "dependency", there are some important differences between them. Gems depend on a name and version range, and intentionally don't care about where exactly the dependencies come from....

posts.message:
Hi,

I just updated my mini website ... Please have a look http://zerox.me/

I have just provided a build of ext2read with GPT support, it allows you to read and copy files/folders from ext2/3/4 from Window, it's a pre-release but shouldn't be dangerous, use with caution anyway :)
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: ext2read - A Windows Application to read and copy Ext2/Ext3/Ext4 (With LVM) Partitions from Windows.
